title: Font from Obama Poster
content:
Hi,  
I really like the design of this poster. Any idea what font is used?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013050456im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/o1_3651.jpg)

from [http://flickr.com/photos/dmolin/2339103532/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013050456/http:/flickr.com/photos/dmolin/2339103532/)

Cheers!

author: subito_g
